scripts.release_minor: npm version minor && npm run update_manifest_minor && git add . && npm run xpiRelease && zip -r twitch-bookmarks.zip dist/web-ext-artifacts && git add . && git commit -m "repackage" && git push
scripts.release_major: npm version major && npm run update_manifest_major && git add . && npm run xpiRelease && zip -r twitch-bookmarks.zip dist/web-ext-artifacts && git add . && git commit -m "repackage" && git push
scripts.update_manifest_minor: jq '.version |= (split(".") | .[1] |= (tonumber + 1 | tostring) | join("."))' ./src/manifest.json > temp.json && mv temp.json ./src/manifest.json
scripts.update_manifest_major: jq '.version |= (split(".") | .[0] |= (tonumber + 1 | tostring) | .[1] = "0" | .[2] = "0" | join("."))' ./src/manifest.json > temp.json && mv temp.json ./src/manifest.json
scripts.xpiRelease: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run xpiExport && mv "./dist/web-ext-artifacts/$(ls -t ./dist/web-ext-artifacts | head -1)" firefox.xpi
